snippet: Josh Haner has spent the last few weeks covering the Republication presidential campaign in Iowa. At first, he played it safe. But when he got bored, the creativity blossomed.
abstract: Josh Haner has spent the last few weeks covering the Republication presidential campaign in Iowa. At first, he played it safe. But when he got bored, the creativity blossomed.

headline.main: On the Campaign Trail in Iowa
